markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

I posted a new thing in Dev: Hashmaps like you’ve never seen them. I also made good progress on deploying the logo-quiz monorepo. It seems to be a problem with vercel, but I think it’ll be possible.

I finished my day with some algorithm training, just to keep me warmed up on that topic.

I’m meditating on this tweet:

I meditate on a thought every day. Today's one hit my email from @visualizevalue.

Avoid constant shiny stuff and survive in this modern distracted world. pic.twitter.com/tcjAweG5Xt

— Carlos Roso (@caroso1222) June 24, 2020
